job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Job Title: Software EngineerLocation: Orlando, FLDuration: 12 MonthsThe Role:We are seeking software engineers in Orlando as part of a core team developing DirectX/Direct3D drivers for desktop/laptop systems. This team is essential to the success of as a growing company. You will be working with the very best in our technology, on some of the most exciting projects the industry has to offer, including Cloud Gaming, Machine Learning, Virtual Reality, Ray Tracing, Direct3D 12, and new game titles.The Person:Good communication skills and an ability to communicate well with teams around the globeAbility to work independently and as part of a teamPassionate about learning, good software engineering, problem solving, and new technologies.Key Responsibilities:The development, debugging, and performance tuning of graphics software running on Microsoft Windows.Collaborating with ASIC design engineers and hardware/software architects, OS engineers and peers in related development teams.The ability to debug low level hardware and operating system functionality is desired.Preferred Experience:Excellent C/C++ programming skills.Experience programming and optimizing gamesKnowledge of computer hardware architecture and organizationExperience with Virtualization technologiesExperience with Linux and Windows OS3D Graphics API knowledge and experience (D3D or Vulkan)3D graphics driver knowledge and experienceWindows development experienceOS and performance knowledge and experienceExperience with multi-threading and concurrent programmingFamiliarity with performance analysis toolsAcademic Credentials:BS Degree; MS or PhD desired.
